name: MobileZombie
description:
About This Game
MobileZombie is a narrative based, stylish, short form advertising ARPG game. The story of this game is about mobile phone overuse. The game encourages players to explore this game world to understand the story. Perhaps you may think this game is not very fun. Well, you are right. It is not a fun game, but this is a meaningful game! I hope you could enjoy it.
How to Play:
Directional keyboard button(left, right) and mouse select.
Features:
- The art style of game is not literally colorful (the game is in black and white)
- Ultimate playing levels
- Excellent soundtrack
- Attractive story
